## Code1
```{r}
#| fig-align: center
#| output-location: fragment
#| code-line-numbers: "|2,3|"

mtcars %>%                               
  ggplot( aes(mpg, hp)) +   
  geom_point() 
```

## {auto-animate="true"}
```{r}
#| fig-align: center
#| output-location: column-fragment

mtcars %>%                               
  ggplot( aes(mpg, hp, size = gear)) +   
  geom_point() +                             
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")        
```

## Code3
```{r}
#| fig-align: center
#| output-location: fragment
#| code-line-numbers: "|3|"

mtcars %>%                               
  ggplot( aes(mpg, hp, color = gear)) +   
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")       
```
